SELECT R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.OWNER_MEMBER_NO,
-- 가장 최근 메시지 내용 (SELECT MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE M WHERE M.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO ORDER BY M.MESSAGE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AS LAST_MESSAGE,
-- 가장 최근 메시지 시간 (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(SEND_DATE), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') FROM CHAT_MESSAGE M WHERE M.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) AS LAST_SEND_TIME,
-- 상대방 닉네임 (SELECT MEMBER_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ( SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM ( SELECT U.MEMBER_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER U WHERE U.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO AND U.MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo} AND R.GROUP_FL = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AS TARGET_NICKNAME,
-- 상대방 프로필 (SELECT PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ( SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM ( SELECT U.MEMBER_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER U WHERE U.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO AND U.MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo} AND R.GROUP_FL = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AS TARGET_PROFILE,
-- 안 읽은 메시지 수 NVL(( SELECT UNREAD_COUNT FROM CHAT_NOTIFICATION N WHERE N.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND N.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO ), 0) AS UNREAD_COUNT,
-- 최근 메시지 번호 (정렬용) (SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_NO) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) AS MAX_MESSAGE_NO,
-- 채팅방 만든 사람의 프로필 이미지 (SELECT PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = R.OWNER_MEMBER_NO) AS OWNER_PROFILE_IMG
FROM CHAT_ROOM R JOIN CHAT_ROOM_USER U ON R.ROOM_NO = U.ROOM_NO WHERE U.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND R.ROOM_DELETED_FL = 'N'
ORDER BY MAX_MESSAGE_NO DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT CM.MESSAGE_NO, CM.MESSAGE_CONTENT, CM.MESSAGE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(CM.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS SEND_TIME, CM.MEMBER_NO AS senderNo, CM.ROOM_NO AS chattingNo,
M.MEMBER_NICK AS senderNickname, M.PROFILE_IMG AS senderProfile
FROM CHAT_MESSAGE CM JOIN MEMBER M ON CM.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE CM.ROOM_NO = #{chattingNo} ORDER BY CM.MESSAGE_NO
SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICK, M.PROFILE_IMG FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER U JOIN MEMBER M ON U.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE U.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND U.MEMBER_NO != #{loginMemberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_TYPE, MEMBER_NO, ROOM_NO, MESSAGE_DEL_FL, SEND_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MESSAGE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{messageContent}, 'TEXT', #{senderNo}, #{roomNo}, 'N', SYSDATE )
